goals.active: Report the destroyed supplies to Steelbane.
goals.complete: Steelbane was furious when I didn't bring him his supplies, so he sent me to the Bane to fight for my life. I defeated all comers, but then Steelbane himself challenged meâ€”and I defeated him, as well. Now I'm legionnaire of this warband! Cerosi and Rage didn't like it, and returned to being gladium. Good riddance.
